meanings.definition: A cooked sausage served in a long, soft roll with mustard or ketchup.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a tasty hotdog at the baseball game.
meanings.sent2: She always orders a hotdog with extra mustard at the food stand.
meanings.sent3: The hotdog jumped into the bun and danced with the condiments.
meanings.sent4: The hotdog was a delicious link of happiness in a bun.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling hotdog filled the air, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: To show off or perform in a flashy or attention-seeking manner.
meanings.sent1: He loves to hotdog on the dance floor, spinning and twirling.
meanings.sent2: The singer decided to hotdog during the concert, impressing the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to hotdog by balancing on one paw, but ended up falling.
meanings.sent4: She hotdogged her way through the talent show, stealing the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The magician hotdogged with his tricks, leaving everyone amazed.
